reviews.review: While by no means a cinema masterpiece, it is a fun and exciting movie for both hardcore and casual Marvel fans

great movie lots of fun and had a real story. Russo brothers were incredible by making sure every character got their own moment in the spotlight.. action scenes were awesome. but the story had a heartbeat so very emotional moments that you may not expect from a movie like this and good comedy not forced or over the top. I'll probably see this movie again before it leaves the theaters.

as a huge fan of Marvel, I am so saddened and disappointed by this colossal mess of a movie. it had gaping plot holes, seemed to forget other MCU films at times, and underutilized its best heroes. such a shame.

The Avengers: Infinity War is like watching your favorite team fail ending after ending and eventually lose the game 0 - 5. The only redeeming points of the movie is the edge of your seat action and the moral discussion that the movie poses. As the final credits began to roll I was left with the question; What is the value of life and who gets to decide who lives or dies. History is full of people who assumed they were qualified to make that decision. Now there's an alien that thinks the way to save the galaxies is to eliminate half of it's population.

Didn't like it at all. Too many different story lines. They added everyone and their mother in the movie. Everyone dies or at least that's what you're lead to believe. I was not entertained at all. A couple of funny scenes but that was it. Wasn't a fan.
The ending made me wanna get a refund for my ticket.
I do think that they sacrificed the story a little by cutting out a lot of Thanos back story. It does not hinder the fact that the movie grabs onto from the opening scene and doesnt let you go.
Avengers: Infinity War is one geek’s wet dream and it’s good

Avengers: Infinity War is a movie that is able to live up to its ten years build up with heartbreaking, breathtaking and spectacular action. The movie is a must-see and is able to perfectly balance every character in it. It's the beginning of the end.
